tidytable 0.5.1
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

arrange.() dt_arrange()

Arrange/reorder rows by variables

as_tidytable() as_dt()

Coerce an object to a data.table/tidytable

bind_rows.() dt_bind_rows() bind_cols.() dt_bind_cols()

Bind data.tables by row and column

case.() dt_case()

Case when

count.() dt_count()

Count observations by group

desc.()

Descending order

distinct.() dt_distinct()

Select distinct/unique rows

drop_na.() dt_drop_na()

Drop rows containing missing values

dt()

Pipeable data.table call

fill.() dt_fill()

Fill in missing values with previous or next value

filter.() dt_filter()

Filter rows on one or more conditions

get_dummies.() dt_get_dummies()

Convert character and factor columns to dummy variables

`%notin%`

notin operator

group_split.() dt_group_split()

Split data frame by groups

ifelse.() dt_ifelse()

Vectorized if

inv_gc()

Run invisible garbage collection

is_tidytable()

Test if the object is a tidytable

leads.() lags.()

Lead and Lag

left_join.() inner_join.() right_join.() full_join.() anti_join.() dt_left_join() dt_inner_join() dt_right_join() dt_full_join() dt_anti_join()

Join two data.tables together

map.() dt_map() map_lgl.() dt_map_lgl() map_int.() dt_map_int() map_dbl.() dt_map_dbl() map_chr.() dt_map_chr() map_dfc.() dt_map_dfc() map_dfr.() dt_map_dfr() map_df.() dt_map_df() walk.() map2.() dt_map2() map2_lgl.() dt_map2_lgl() map2_int.() dt_map2_int() map2_dbl.() dt_map2_dbl() map2_chr.() dt_map2_chr() map2_dfc.() dt_map2_dfc() map2_dfr.() dt_map2_dfr() map2_df.() dt_map2_df()

Apply a function to each element of a vector

mutate.() dt_mutate()

Mutate

mutate_across.() dt_mutate_across()

Mutate multiple columns simultaneously

mutate_if.() mutate_at.() mutate_all.() dt_mutate_if() dt_mutate_at() dt_mutate_all()

Deprecated mutate helpers

n.() dt_n()

Number of observations in each group

nest_by.() dt_group_nest()

Nest data.tables

pivot_longer.() dt_pivot_longer()

Pivot data from wide to long

pivot_wider.() dt_pivot_wider()

Pivot data from long to wide

pull.() dt_pull()

Pull out a single variable

relocate.() dt_relocate()

Relocate a column to a new position

rename.() dt_rename()

Rename variables by name

rename_all.() rename_at.() rename_across.() rename_if.() dt_rename_across() dt_rename_all() dt_rename_if() dt_rename_at()

Deprecated rename helpers

rename_with.() dt_rename_with()

Rename multiple columns

replace_na.() dt_replace_na()

Replace missing values

row_number.() dt_row_number()

Return row number

select.() dt_select()

Select or drop columns

separate.() dt_separate()

Separate a character column into multiple columns

slice.() slice_head.() slice_tail.() slice_max.() slice_min.() dt_slice() dt_slice_head() dt_slice_tail() dt_slice_min() dt_slice_max()

Choose rows by position

starts_with.() dt_starts_with() contains.() dt_contains() ends_with.() dt_ends_with() everything.() dt_everything() any_of.() dt_any_of()

Select helpers

summarize.() summarise.() dt_summarise() dt_summarize()

Aggregate data using summary statistics

summarize_across.() summarise_across.()

Summarize multiple columns

tidytable()

Build a data.table/tidytable

top_n.() dt_top_n()

Select top (or bottom) n rows (by value)

transmute.() dt_transmute()

Add new variables and drop all others

unite.() dt_unite()

Unite multiple columns by pasting strings together

unnest.() dt_unnest_legacy()

Unnest a nested data.table

where()

Select variables with a function
